Text: It's legit! Thanks for the upload. Hope this album's as good as the last. Supposed to be more country and American folk than their previous. Listening to the first track as I write. Very different... In some ways, a return to things like their debut.
you're welcome onura. good album too...
Thank you trfkad! Love this band; best American musicians since Mercury Rev imho. England loves them! I will of course buy a copy come January.
Hi Jim. I love both Mercury Rev (deserter's songs is one of my fav albums ever) and Decemberists. By the way, the more i listen this album, the more i like it...
thanks man, love this band, will seed
